name: Letta - Platform for Stateful AI Agents
snippet:
Use the Letta API to build agents that can actually remember and learn about your users over time. Open source, production ready, and fully model-agnostic.
Open source, production ready, and fully model-agnostic. Letta Code is a memory-first coding harness, built on top of the Letta API. Instead of working in independent sessions, you work with a persisted agent that learns over time and is portable across models.

name: Letta: Platform for building stateful agents - open AI
snippet:
Letta is an open source project built by over a hundred contributors from around the world. There are many ways to get involved in the Letta OSS project!
Letta Code supports skills and subagents, and bundles pre-built skills/subagents for advanced memory and continual learning. Letta is fully model-agnostic, though we recommend Opus 4.5 and GPT-5.2 for best performance (see our model leaderboard for our rankings).

name: Letta: An Open-Source Framework for Building Stateful
snippet: Letta is an open-source framework designed for the development of stateful large language model (LLM) applications.

name: Tutorial on building agent with memory using Letta
snippet: The course covers both the memory management research (e.g. MemGPT) behind Letta , as well as an introduction to using the OSS agents framework.

name: LLMs as Operating Systems: Agent Memory
snippet: How to create and interact with a MemGPT agent using the Letta framework , and how to build and edit its core and archival memory. How core memory is designed ...

name: Letta AI - AI Agent
snippet: Letta AI is an open-source platform designed to enable developers to create, deploy, and manage AI agents endowed with persistent memory and advanced reasoning ...

name: letta · PyPI
snippet: Letta is the platform for building stateful agents: AI with advanced memory that can learn and self-improve over time. Requires Node.js 18+. When running the CLI tool, your agent help you code and do any task you can do on your computer.
